I knew it had to exist... a place for a kick-ass salad.  I was gonna go for their namesake "wow" salad, but opted for the goat cheese salad instead.   for 8 euros, you get a nice big bowl of mixed greens (i couldn't even finish it) with two big slices of goat cheese, sliced apples, and walnuts - with a mustard based dressing. They also have tapas and sandwiches, but i was thrilled at the prospect of a good salad.  I'm not a vegetarian by any means, but i'm so over meat at this point.a meal without jamon or pork of any sort.  wonderful!
